titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 80 Killian Road in Massapequa, New York, as the "Gerard A. Fiorenza Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 4/16/2002--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 80 Killian Road in Massapequa, New York, as the Gerard A. Fiorenza Post Office Building.
